name: Welcome to the Impossimaze
description:
Welcome to the Impossimaze is a short absurdist puzzle game taking place in a 2D maze. Schmoove your way around the Impossimaze to find your way home!

Make sure you exhaust everyone's dialogue options and find all the secrets if you're looking for the Super Secret Ending (tm)!

Made in 2 weeks as an exploration of Bitsy Hacks and editing the engine.

You can also find it on Github here: https://github.com/berivera1/welcome-to-the-impossimaze
